We’re getting close to an energy crisis - Heather du Plessis-Allan https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/were-getting-close-to-an-energy-crisis-heather-du-plessis-allan/WL3KPZEI4NH47OY7EBS7WUD6ZY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/were-getting-close-to-an-energy-crisis-heather-du-plessis-allan/WL3KPZEI4NH47OY7EBS7WUD6ZY/ Heather du Plessis-AllanOPINION: Our electricity prices last week were said to be the highest in the world. Even the quickest fix of importing LNG from Australia is at least a year away, writes Heather du Plessis-Allan. Photo / Getty Images
